Class SerializationUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Toolbox class that contains helpful method for dealing with serialization aspect.

      • deserialize

        public static <T> T deserialize(java.io.File file,
                                java.lang.Class<T> target)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Deserializes the given file into an object instance of the given target class.
        Parameters:
        file - File to deserialize.
        target - Target class that object will be deserialize into.
        Returns:
        Deserialized object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any error occurs while reading file content.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If any error occurs while retrieving serialized object class.
